text:
I am really surprised that this products gets such a bad rap some times. It is not coffee, it is a coffee DRINK, and it is darn good. If you ever go to the grocery store and purchase a cappuccino drink that is ready to go and you just have to add hot water, this is
similar, and it is good!!! You could add a little whipped milk on the top if you want, but you don't have to!! I am very happy with this product!!!
